description:
The World Racing Grand Prix final between Team 5D`s and Team New World begins. Yusei and company realize that New Domino City will vanish off the face of the earth if they don`t win, so they need to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight for the Future! Machine Emperor Skiel VS Scar-Red Nova Dragon
Mirai o Kaketa Tatakai! Kikoutei Skiel vs Scar-Red Nova Dragon
未来を賭けた戦い! 機皇帝スキエル VS スカーレッド・ノヴァ・ドラゴン
